title: To everyone crying about Riven saying she is OP

replies.body:
"A sword mirrors its owner" -Riven

Broken sword
Broken champion

-Original Joke- 

DO NOT STEAL
Right? How the shit do those posts still get upvoted?

From people that aren't on boards that much that are probably seeing it for the first time would be my logical guess.

I suppose some people don't think logically, though.
In my experience: You either don't use the boards, or you spend more time on it than actually in game/
A truer statement has never been said.
I made this joke back in S3 when she was broken.
7/10 too many upvotes to actually fool somebody

I feel like anyone who complains about Riven at this point after all the nerfs needs to seriously examine their laning mechanics, because the only people Riven gets really fed off of at this point are people who feed everyone.
hey guys, i found the riven main.

It's funny because I've argued against Slamurai Jack before about Riven, he is decidedly _not_ a Riven main, but he says something that disagrees with the boards circle jerk and you lump him in with this mysterous Riven main illuminati who conspire to ruin everything.

Amusing.

It's also funny because he's right, Riven isn't particularly good right now, the only thing keeping her afloat atm is her inflated number of mains compared to other champions.

> [{quoted}](name=Primoc Tenebrous,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5t3m90WK,comment-id=00050001,timestamp=2015-08-26T22:58:52.766+0000)
>
> hey guys, i found the riven main.

I honestly never play Riven unless it's for fun with some friends. I'm not very good at her and she's too hard to actually win with. I prefer Yasuo myself.

BoxBox destroys people at master and challenger level consistently with riven. You should tell that to the challenger level player he just 100-0'd at lvl 2 because you obviously get to that level by being a feeder who doesn't understand lane matchups.

BoxBox is also one of the best Riven players in the entire world. His win rate with Riven is only 63%, which sounds like a lot until you realize that Challenger players naturally have very high win rates since they never play against people truly better than them, but they often play against people worse than them. 63% is good but hardly out of line for a main champion, particularly if you main that champion at the highest level of play. Faker has like a 63% win rate in Solo Q total between all his champs.

i personally like to troll riven with a 25 armor rune page and a cloth armor but if someone doesnt have that rune page i can see her being a problem early. all im saying is that watching riven in the hands of a real riven player is pretty sick. getting a 500 damage shield every couple seconds is not ok

Gotta love when people point to either "best player of certain champ" or "I saw in the LCS" to promote something like this. Riven is only scary when fed, so play something other than a tank and destroy her.

Her laning phase is overbearing and she sacrifises nothing for it. Lets look at darius for example, he is a lane dominator, however, he is so easily kited and has 0 mobility. Riven getws her strenght and lane domination, yet she has no downsides for that.

I find it really, really hard to believe you're the same elo as me. Your profile says Diamond 4 but you whine about "broken" champions and items like a fucking silver player. I expect better tbh.

Of course, ad hominem attacks. What did i expect?

This happens in every riven thread. Want to discuss? Nope. People which defend riven will just - you instantly and belitle you.

Riven is not broken, i have said that many many many fcking times. I have no problem fighting vs rivens. But her whole kit is overloaded and gets a lot of power it shouldnt get from animation canceling. She doesnt have any downsides in her kit, no good hook to get on, even her counters dont counter her.

Example, garen, caclulations were made, and it so happens thar riven beats even her counters in a straight up duel.



But of course, ignore all that, call me bad, call me a bronzie, call me eune trash and then downvote me away. That is all you NA people capable of. its quite sad actually, that people in eune are more friendly and capable of discussion without bringing elo every second and laughing  at everyone with different opinion.

I don't think it has anything to do with NA vs EUNE. People in general get like that when arguing. Some of you just don't know how to properly do it and convey your point in a productive manner.  I may not play ranked, but I would surmise that the level of play/tactics for riven varies significantly as you move up in ranked...........so naturally opinions would conflict. All in all, I think you should direct your efforts toward Fiora and that godly heal xD

You know what i am even more disgusted by this? People actually support these ad hominem attacks. In eune we also had them, but all ad hominem attacks were downvoted and discussions were upvoted.

Here its the opposite. Arguments are dowvoted and ad hominem attacks are upvoted.

Well you will never be able to change that I bet. It is quite sad, but LOL is so diverse when it comes to the player base. There will be knuckleheads on each side of any argument. I just hope that people in general will learn to use the boards in a more productive manner as a whole. Some topics/comments are just plain ludicrous.
She's not OP...she's just a FREAKING HUGE pain in the ass

I'd rather fight Riven than any of these jackasses.

http://champion.gg/statistics/#?roleSort=&sortBy=general.winPercent&order=descend 

In plat+ her winrate is 66th overall.

http://champion.gg/statistics/#?roleSort=Top&sortBy=general.winPercent&order=descend

18th of top laners, below such infamous badasses as, Aatrox, Galio, Akali, Pantheon, Renekton, and the Donger. 

She also has one of the most skewed player bases of any champion, the only thing keeping her in the game is that the people who do play her play her a _lot._ 

But whatever, "Riven is OP" is a meme at this point, they could remove all of her mobility with no compensation and you'd still see these threads, lol.

It's almost as bad as the "Lee is OP" circlejerk at this point. Almost, but not quite. At least with Riven, you can say she's potentially extremely oppressive in the hands of a very, very good Riven player, although most champions are when played to mastery. Lee Sin isn't impressive even when played by Lee Sin mains and playing against anyone who isn't a Lee main is basically a joke. Lee is a good choice for literally the top 1% of Lee players and garbage for everyone else.
And LB had 45% winrate in her broken state. Does that mean she was underpowered and didnt need nerfs ever?

> [{quoted}](name=Dextix LT,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5t3m90WK,comment-id=000b0003,timestamp=2015-08-27T05:10:54.534+0000)
>
> And LB had 45% winrate in her broken state. Does that mean she was underpowered and didnt need nerfs ever?

"I have no evidence she's too strong, and the evidence on display says she isn't, but she totally is, trust me"

You used her winrate as an argument that rivven is balanced.

My counterargument was that LB had a 45% winrate in her broken state.

So if LB could have been broken in her 45% winrate state, why cant riven? Why does riven get defended with that argument?

These are double standarts.

But of course, make fun of me instead of coming up with a refutation to an argument. That is all you NA people capable of. No discussion only making fun of everyone else.

>You used her winrate as an argument that rivven is balanced.
>My counterargument was that LB had a 45% winrate in her broken state.

The problem is that this treats LB being broken as some sort of fact that goes on unsupported. "LB is broken despite her shit winrate because she is broken." That is circular reasoning.

And frankly, I never felt LB was broken once she lost her silence. 
>So if LB could have been broken in her 45% winrate state, why cant riven? Why does riven get defended with that argument?

You'd have to prove LB was broken before this was some sort of counterpoint.

>But of course, make fun of me instead of coming up with a refutation to an argument. That is all you NA people capable of. No discussion only making fun of everyone else.

Sure, man, I wasn't pointing out that you had nothing to support your point, I was just being a big meanie and what I say should be disregarded because I'm an NA meanie. Wait, that's an ad hominem!

My point, oh sensitive Eurofriend, was that unless you can support your point, when evidence points to the reality being contrary to your stance, it's most likely that your stance is wrong. 

If Riven is and LB was Broken, why can't people consistently win with them? Answer me that question.

Umm, that was one of her winrates when she still had her silence...... And riot admitted that she was toxic and unfair to play against, thats why she was nerfed.


Not responding to the last part, since it again, is ad hominem.

Ad hominem doesn't mean what you think it means. 

"An ad hominem (Latin for "to the man" or "to the person"[1]), short for argumentum ad hominem, means responding to arguments by attacking a person's character, rather than to the content of their arguments"

Wikipedia. 

Nowhere did I do that, you did, though. 

>But of course, make fun of me instead of coming up with a refutation to an argument. That is all you NA people capable of. No discussion only making fun of everyone else.

This is an actual ad hominem. 

You did nothing to address my argument:

>My point, oh sensitive Eurofriend, was that unless you can support your point, when evidence points to the reality being contrary to your stance, it's most likely that your stance is wrong.
>
>If Riven is and LB was Broken, why can't people consistently win with them? Answer me that question.

^Respond to the above, or concede by default. If your reasoning cannot be supported, examine your stance.

Umm, that was one of her winrates when she still had her silence...... And riot admitted that she was toxic and unfair to play against, thats why she was nerfed. (45%)

I have to repeat it since you deecided to ignore it.

And now my opinion to the last part (besides ad hominem). WInrate is an unreliable statistic to seee if a champion is balanced. Champions like LB were admited toxic to the game and offering 0 counterplay by riot , yet still had 45% winrates.

Winrate is a statistic that depends on 11000000000 variables, even 1 different rune in 1 diffeerent match can make you win or lose, even 1 second of walking to the wrong side will affect how the rest of the game works. Everything you do in the game, changes what happens after in a butterfly effect.


Champions strenght is but only 1 variable out of all of those. Winrate doesnt show how strong is a champion.

And i will repeat it Riven isnt really broken, but she is unbalanced. Her kit has no real weaknesses and is overloaded. Her kit is toxic to play against and animation canceling gives her power it shouldnt be there.

Winrate, is not a reliable statistic, to consider a champons strenght.

Win rate is much more reliable than anecdotes. LB was toxic. Toxic =/= OP.

> Winrate is a statistic that depends on 11000000000 variables, even 1 different rune in 1 diffeerent match can make you win or lose, even 1 second of walking to the wrong side will affect how the rest of the game works. > Champions strenght is but only 1 variable out of all of those. Winrate doesnt show how strong is a champion.
> 
> And i will repeat it Riven isnt really broken, but she is unbalanced. Her kit has no real weaknesses and is overloaded. Her kit is toxic to play against and animation canceling gives her power it shouldnt be there.
> 
> Winrate, is not a reliable statistic, to consider a champons strenght.

I mean, you can say that, but you can't support it. Please, support it. How is her kit overloaded? How is being a squishy melee whose abilities turn her into a human skillshot (AKA extremely vulnerable) not a weakness? Low base stats? High early CDs? Massive vulnerability when her Q is down? Those are all weaknesses. She's also not toxic, and exhibits none of Zileas' anti-patterns, what she is, is snowbally, which is not inherently bad.

If Riven is unbalanced, then why can her players not win with her?
